00016 // Method table for use by HasMethod and Invoke.
00017 std::map<NPIdentifier, ScriptingBridge::Method>*
00018     ScriptingBridge::method_table;
00019 
00020 // Property table for use by {Has|Get|Set|Remove}Property.
00021 std::map<NPIdentifier, ScriptingBridge::Property>*

00024 NPObject* ScriptingBridge::GetScriptableObject() {
00025   printf("++ NPObject* ScriptingBridge::GetScriptableObject() {\n");
00026   if (scriptable_object_ == NULL) {
00027     scriptable_object_ =
00028         NPN_CreateObject(npp_, &ScriptingBridge::np_class);
00029   }
00030   if (scriptable_object_) {
00031     NPN_RetainObject(scriptable_object_);
00032   }
00033   return scriptable_object_;
00034 }

00052 NPError ScriptingBridge::SetWindow(NPWindow* window) {
00053   printf("++ NPError ScriptingBridge::SetWindow(NPWindow* window) {\n");
00054   if (!window)
00055     return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00056   if (!IsContextValid())
00057     CreateContext();
00058   if (!IsContextValid())
00059     return NPERR_GENERIC_ERROR;
00060   // Clear the 2D drawing context.
00061   //pthread_create(&thread_, NULL, pi, this);
00062   window_ = window;
00063   // return Paint() ? NPERR_NO_ERROR : NPERR_GENERIC_ERROR;
00064   return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void ScriptingBridge::CreateContext() {
00068   printf("++ void ScriptingBridge::CreateContext() {\n");
00069   if (IsContextValid())
00070     return;
00071   device2d_ = NPN_AcquireDevice(npp_, NPPepper2DDevice);
00072   assert(IsContextValid());
00073   memset(&context2d_, 0, sizeof(context2d_));
00074   NPDeviceContext2DConfig config;
00075   NPError init_err = device2d_->initializeContext(npp_, &config, &context2d_);
00076   assert(NPERR_NO_ERROR == init_err);
00077 }

00080 // Sets up method_table and property_table.
00081 bool ScriptingBridge::InitializeIdentifiers() {
00082   printf("++ bool ScriptingBridge::InitializeIdentifiers() {\n");
00083   id_paint = NPN_GetStringIdentifier("paint");
00084 
00085   method_table =
00086       new(std::nothrow) std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>;
00087   if (method_table == NULL) {
00088     return false;
00089   }
00090   
00091   AddMethod("paint", &ScriptingBridge::Paint, id_paint);
00092   
00093   //method_table->insert(
00094   // std::pair<NPIdentifier, Method>(id_paint, &ScriptingBridge::Paint));
00095   //  method_table[id_paint] = &ScriptingBridge::Paint;
00096   
00097   property_table =
00098       new(std::nothrow) std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>;
00099   if (property_table == NULL) {
00100     return false;
00101   }
00102 
00103   return true;
00104 }

00112 bool ScriptingBridge::AddMethod(std::string meth_name, Method meth, NPIdentifier meth_id){
00113   printf("++ bool ScriptingBridge::AddMethod(std::string meth_name, Method meth, NPIdentifier meth_id){\n");
00114   meth_id = NPN_GetStringIdentifier(meth_name.c_str());  
00115   method_table->insert(
00116       std::pair<NPIdentifier, Method>(meth_id, meth));
00117   //  method_table[id_paint] = &ScriptingBridge::Paint; 
00118   return true;
00119 }

00139 // Class-specific implementation of HasMethod, used by the C-style one
00140 // below.
00141 bool ScriptingBridge::HasMethod(NPIdentifier name) {
00142   //printf("++ bool ScriptingBridge::HasMethod(NPIdentifier name) {\n");
00143   std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>::iterator i;
00144   i = method_table->find(name);
00145   return i != method_table->end();
00146 }
00147 
00148 // Class-specific implementation of HasProperty, used by the C-style one
00149 // below.
00150 bool ScriptingBridge::HasProperty(NPIdentifier name) {
00151   //printf("++ bool ScriptingBridge::HasProperty(NPIdentifier name) {\n");
00152   std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>::iterator i;
00153   i = property_table->find(name);
00154   return i != property_table->end();
00155 }
00156 
00157 // Class-specific implementation of GetProperty, used by the C-style one
00158 // below.
00159 bool ScriptingBridge::GetProperty(NPIdentifier name, NPVariant *result) {
00160   printf("++ bool ScriptingBridge::GetProperty(NPIdentifier name, NPVariant *result) {\n");
00161   VOID_TO_NPVARIANT(*result);
00162 
00163   std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>::iterator i;
00164   i = property_table->find(name);
00165   if (i != property_table->end()) {
00166     return (this->*(i->second))(result);
00167   }
00168   return false;
00169 }
00170

00194 // Class-specific implementation of Invoke, used by the C-style one
00195 // below.
00196 bool ScriptingBridge::Invoke(NPIdentifier name,
00197                              const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count,
00198                              NPVariant* result) {
00199   //printf("++ bool ScriptingBridge::Invoke(NPIdentifier name,\n");
00200   std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>::iterator i;
00201   i = method_table->find(name);
00202   if (i != method_table->end()) {
00203     return (this->*(i->second))(args, arg_count, result);
00204   }
00205   return false;
00206 }

00216 // Called by the browser when a plugin is being destroyed to clean up any
00217 // remaining instances of NPClass.
00218 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00219 void Invalidate(NPObject* object) {
00220   printf("++ void Invalidate(NPObject* object) {\n");
00221   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->Invalidate();
00222 }

00232 // Called by the browser to invoke a function object whose name is |name|.
00233 // Called by NPN_Invoke, declared in npruntime.h

00236             const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count,
00237             NPVariant* result) {

00240       name, args, arg_count, result);

00243 // Called by the browser to invoke the default method on an NPObject.
00244 // In this case the default method just returns false.
00245 // Apparently the plugin won't load properly if we simply
00246 // tell the browser we don't have this method.
00247 // Called by NPN_InvokeDefault, declared in npruntime.h
00248 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00249 bool InvokeDefault(NPObject* object, const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count, NPVariant* result) {
00250   printf("++ bool InvokeDefault(NPObject* object, const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count, NPVariant* result) {\n");
00251   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->InvokeDefault(
00252       args, arg_count, result);
00253 }

00311 // Represents a class's interface, so that the browser knows what functions it
00312 // can call on this plugin object.  The browser can use the methods in this
00313 // class to discover the rest of the plugin's interface.
00314 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00315 
00316 
00317 NPClass bridge::ScriptingBridge::np_class = {
00318   NP_CLASS_STRUCT_VERSION,
00319   bridge::Allocate,
00320   bridge::Deallocate,
00321   bridge::Invalidate,
00322   bridge::HasMethod,
00323   bridge::Invoke,
00324   bridge::InvokeDefault,
00325   bridge::HasProperty,
00326   bridge::GetProperty,
00327   bridge::SetProperty,
00328   bridge::RemoveProperty
00329 };
